Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError exception is raised when trying to retrieve a
        secret's attributes with an invalid ID.
        """
args = [0]
with ProxyKmipClient() as client:
    self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'uid must be a string', client.
        get_attributes, *args)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
